entity.name: Updates on COVID-19 in Australia
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with information and advice from the prime minister, state and federal governments, health authorities and other trusted sources from around Australia. For more, visit https://www.health.gov.au/.

text: @realDonaldTrump Re opening early could both destroy health and economy. You will likely have to close again from the kind of crisis we will face. Imagine multiple New York’s? Please listen to your health officials Mr. Trump. May God give you the grace to make a wise decision here. #COVID19
